subTitle: Ask us anything about our brand and products, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: What types of tools are included in the Starter Kit?
faqs.answer: The Starter Kit features essential hand and power tools for diverse DIY projects, including hammers, drills, screwdrivers, and a variety of fasteners. It's a curated selection to help beginners and experienced DIYers alike tackle most home improvement tasks.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade from the Starter Kit to the Professional Toolbox?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade to the Professional Toolbox at any time to access a wider range of high-quality tools, enjoy priority customer support, and receive exclusive content. Contact our support team for a seamless transition.

faqs.question: What discounts are available for bulk orders through the Professional Toolbox plan?
faqs.answer: Professional Toolbox members are entitled to exclusive discounts on bulk orders, the percentage of which may vary depending on the order volume. Get in touch with us to discuss your needs, and we'll provide a tailored discount structure.

faqs.question: What kind of customer support can I expect?
faqs.answer: All our customers receive dedicated email support. With the Starter Kit, you'll receive our standard support, while the Professional Toolbox plan upgrades you to priority support, meaning faster response times and specialized assistance.

faqs.question: How current are the online resources and tutorials?
faqs.answer: We regularly update our online resources and tutorials to reflect the latest trends in DIY and construction, as well as introductions to new tools and techniques. Our material aims to be comprehensive and user-friendly for all skill levels.

faqs.question: Does ScrewFast offer services for large-scale construction projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, our Enterprise Solutions are designed for larger companies requiring comprehensive services. We provide consultation, planning, and supply of high-grade tools and materials, as well as staffing solutions for substantial construction needs. Contact us for a customized quote.

faqs.question: What is your return and warranty policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all our products. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return unused items for a full refund. Additionally, all our tools come with a manufacturer's warranty ranging from 1 to 5 years depending on the product.

faqs.question: Do you provide training for using specialized tools?
faqs.answer: Yes! Professional Toolbox members receive access to custom training sessions and comprehensive video tutorials. We also offer on-site training for enterprise clients to ensure your team can maximize the efficiency and safety of our tools.

faqs.question: How quickly can I expect delivery?
faqs.answer: Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days. Professional Toolbox members enjoy expedited shipping (1-2 business days) at no additional cost. We also offer same-day delivery in select metropolitan areas.

faqs.question: Are your tools suitable for professional contractors?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Our Professional Toolbox is specifically designed for contractors and construction professionals. All our tools meet or exceed industry standards and are built to withstand heavy-duty use on commercial job sites.
